description:
The Green Bay Packers created this free app to help you, our fans, find and connect with each other at official Packers bars, restaurants, and events across the country. 

Download this app to see where other Packers fans will be watching the game near you — even if you're on-the-go and hundreds of miles from Lambeau Field.

We'll also hold contests, conduct polls, and send out special offers throughout the season, exclusively on this app. Packers Everywhere fans can also expect unique stories on fans, bars, and Packers from around the country.

Packers fans are everywhere. And the Green Bay Packers created this app to bring together the greatest fans in the world closer to the team. Download this app today and get ready to cheer on the Green and Gold.
Go Pack go!

==============

FEATURES INCLUDE: 

COMPREHENSIVE DIRECTORY of official Packers bars and restaurants

INTERACTIVE MAPS for finding official Packers bars and restaurants, getting directions, and storing your favorites

EXCLUSIVE OFFERS on beverages, food, and merchandise at official Packers Everywhere establishments

FACEBOOK & FOURSQUARE INTEGRATION to invite your friends to join you at games and events

PHOTO UPLOADING to share your pride with other Packers fans

ACCESS to exclusive Packers Everywhere content and contests
releaseNotes: Support added for the 2012 regular and preseason
